component.name: ZXing.Net.Mobile
component.summary: ZXing.Net.Mobile is a C#/.NET Barcode Scanning Library

sample.name: iOS.
sample.summary: Demonstrates how to implement Barcode Scanning in a Xamarin.iOS application

sample.name: Android.
sample.summary: Demonstrates how to implement Barcode Scanning in a Xamarin.Android application

sample.name: WindowsPhone8.
